text: In order to generate recombinant baculoviruses for 3a protein (rBV-3a), all constructs of the SARS-CoV 3a gene were cloned into a pFastBac vector (Invitrogen) containing a tobacco etch virus (TEV) cleavable site and 10 histidine residues fused to the C terminus of the 3a constructs. Recombinant baculoviruses were produced following the instructions of the manufacturer (Invitrogen).
